data.title: Amazon.in: Pooja Sharma: books, biography, latest update
data.meta_description: Follow Pooja Sharma and explore their bibliography from Amazon.com's Pooja Sharma Author Page.
data.text:
Pooja Sharma is a qualified nutritionist, a wellness coach, and an author. Her credits include many works on health, wellness, and nutrition published internationally. She has earned a certification on ‘Building Personal Resilience: Managing Anxiety and Mental Health’ from Harvard Medical School of Harvard University, USA. She is certified in ‘Nutrition, Heart Disease and Diabetes’ by Wageningen University & Research, Netherlands. And, she has also earned a certification on ‘The Psychology of Emotions & Embodied Cognition’ from the University of Cambridge, UK. Her YouTube channel, 'Healtheotic,' contains her video blogs on health, wellness, and nutrition.

Read full bio
